title: Ethereum Software Infrastructure Provider Flashbots Raises $60 Million - Bloomberg
summary: Flashbots, an Ethereum software infrastructure provider, raised $60 million in a series B round led by Paradigm. The funding gives the company a valuation of at least $1 billion and will be used to develop a new version of its technology. The round was raised through a unique "beauty contest for decentralization" in which investors were selected based on their reverse pitches. This marks a shift in Silicon Valley venture capitalist's focus from AI to crypto companies like Flashbots.

title: Staying optimistic about Ethereum's optimistic rollups - Blockworks
summary: Ethereum's layer-2 ecosystem is growing, with nearly 30 different networks deployed. Optimistic rollups are the dominant protocols, with Arbitrum and Optimism leading the way. Arbitrum has the highest TVL at $5.82B, while Optimism's source code is completely open-source. Base Protocol, built on Optimism, is focused on decentralization and security, and Coinbase's decentralized L2 network is prominently using the Optimism stack. The future of on-chain computation is expected to compete with cloud computing giants, and L2 networks are poised to play a key role.

title: How To Check An Ethereum Transaction? - Watcher Guru
summary:
How To Check An Ethereum Transaction?

* Obtain transaction hash from wallet or exchange
* Use blockchain explorer like Etherscan or MyEtherWallet
* Input transaction hash and view details
* Review transaction status, amount, gas fee, and confirmation time
* Use tools like Metamask, MyEtherWallet, or Etherscan Mobile App for additional features and real-time updates
* Understand network congestion, gas price, and transaction complexity affect transaction time.

title: Solana-Based NFT Marketplace Exchange.art to Expand Into Ethereum - CoinDesk
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Solana-based NFT marketplace Exchange.art to expand into Ethereum to cater to artist demand. Artists want to maintain only one platform and community, reducing the need to juggle between multiple platforms and update information. This move will help many artists.

title: Some Crypto Whales Predict $3,000 for Ethereum (ETH) In 2023 – Others Would Rather Take Their Chances on Promising VC Spectra (SPCT) - Coin Rivet
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in 256 tokens or less:

Some investors predict that Ethereum (ETH) will reach $3,000 in 2023, while others believe that VC Spectra (SPCT) has the potential to become a strong challenger to Ethereum's (ETH) dominance. VC Spectra (SPCT) has raised $2.4 million in its private sale and offers investors the opportunity to earn interest through buybacks and dividends, as well as access to exclusive projects. The token is deflationary and has already seen a 37.5% increase in price. However, some investors predict a 20% decline in Ethereum (ETH) due to rising gas fees.

title: Ether death cross threatens more downside as ETH price trades at a key support level - Cointelegraph
summary: Ether (ETH) prices have fallen this week, with several indicators suggesting further downside could be in store. On-chain and technical analysis shows that the ETH network value-to-transaction value (NVT) metric has been overvalued since the beginning of 2023, and the profit levels of short-term and long-term holders may limit the downward movement. However, the on-chain metrics also suggest that the price could suffer some selling pressure from short-term holders and panic selling from investors spooked by relatively lower levels of activity in 2023. The ETH/USD pair shows bearish risk in the short term with an impending death cross on the weekly scale, and the derivatives data indicates that there has been no significant change in the open interest volume for futures contracts. The options data, on the other hand, reveals a bullish bias with a notable concentration of call options between $1,900 and $2,400. The article concludes that Ether's negative selling pressure could persist for a couple of weeks, but there is potential for a strong influx of buyers at

title: Former Goldman Sachs Executive Says Solana (SOL) Set To Outperform Ethereum (ETH) – Here’s His Outlook - The Daily Hodl
summary: Former Goldman Sachs executive Raoul Pal says Solana (SOL) is likely to outperform Ethereum (ETH) based on recent price action and adoption trends. Solana has broken out of a descending channel and is up over 30% in the past month, while Ethereum is down. Pal expects the broader crypto market to outperform other asset classes due to wider global adoption and central bank digital currency initiatives. The approval of a spot-based Bitcoin ETF will also drive crypto prices higher, according to Pal. He forecasts higher prices for Solana and the broader crypto market.

title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin barely holds $29,000; Ethereum above $1,900; Dogecoin rises 8% - Business Today
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in 256 tokens or less:

Investors are awaiting the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting this week, which may lead to a 25 basis point rate hike. The TOMO/USDT price has jumped 4% in the last 24 hours and formed a cup and handle pattern.

title: EigenLayer's endgame: 'Dissolve into Ethereum itself' - Blockworks
summary: EigenLayer, a smart contract middleware, aims to provide a "marketplace for raw, decentralized trust" by allowing Ethereum stakers to opt-in to serve other systems, called "actively validated services." The platform allows for open innovation, with a focus on decentralization and minimizing subjective decisions. EigenLayer's endgame is to become part of Ethereum's staking layer, with the goal of dissolving into Ethereum itself. The platform is currently undergoing an initial shepherding process with whitelisting for cautionary purposes, and will eventually be a completely permissionless platform.

title: Fidelity Backs Ethereum: Wall Street’s Biggest Players Bet On Crypto’s Number 2 - NewsBTC
summary: Fidelity has released a report on Ethereum (ETH) highlighting key metrics to watch for the cryptocurrency in the coming months. The report shows that Ethereum has remained above key support levels, with the realized price serving as a strong support level since January 10th. The NUPL ratio is currently in a neutral zone, while the MVRV Z-Score indicates that the cryptocurrency’s market value is estimated to be just over the “fair” zone, potentially setting the stage for a bull run or at least sideways price action. The percent of unique addresses in profit is currently at nearly 66%, suggesting that Ethereum owners may be using the cryptocurrency for trading, DeFi, staking, or buying other digital assets. The Pi Cycle indicators are showing that Ethereum is currently in a neutral zone, and the number of monthly new Ethereum addresses has slowly increased by 9% in Q2 2023. However, the short-term moving average of new addresses is rising back above that of the longer-term moving average, indicating that the rate of new users joining the network is increasing. title: Solana Gaming Franchise Aurory Expands to Ethereum Layer-2 Arbitrum - Decrypt
summary: Aurory, a Solana-based NFT-driven game franchise, is expanding to Ethereum's layer-2 scaling network, Arbitrum. The move allows Aurory to tap into Ethereum's larger audience and liquidity, while still maintaining support for Solana. The expansion is not a migration, but rather an expansion of the franchise's reach. Aurory's SyncSpace technology will enable users to move their assets between Solana and Arbitrum, and into the games. The goal is to create new on-ramps into the game and tap into other crypto communities, rather than primarily moving NFTs and tokens between chains. Aurory plans to explore functional in-game benefits tied to specific chains, such as NPCs that can only be traded with on certain chains. The franchise has two games in development, Aurory Adventures and Aurory Tactics, and offers playable character NFTs, animal NFTs, character skins, and tokens on-chain.

title: Vitalik Buterin's Net Worth Grows in 2023 - Latest Cryptocurrency Prices & Articles
summary: Vitalik Buterin's net worth is estimated to be around $600 million in 2023, primarily from his on-chain Ethereum holdings and off-chain assets. He is a co-founder of Ethereum and has made significant contributions to the cryptocurrency and blockchain space. The article discusses his early life, career development, and philanthropic endeavors, as well as the current state of Ethereum and its potential for future growth. The article also mentions the Ethereum 2.0 upgrade, which aims to increase the number of transactions, improve smart contracts' stability, and reduce network fees. Additionally, the article highlights the Shanghai upgrade, which introduced a new fee structure to make ETH more deflationary. Overall, the article provides an overview of Vitalik Buterin's impact on the cryptocurrency industry and his continued involvement in its evolution.

title: Polygon’s Growing Impact: Real-World Implementations Expanding on Ethereum’s Layer-2 Network - CoinTrust
summary:
Polygon, a leading Ethereum layer-2 network, is expanding its reach beyond the blockchain ecosystem, with various real-world implementations. These include:

1. National University of Mongolia (NUM) issuing soulbound tokens as digital diplomas to graduates, ensuring tamper-proof and immutable academic qualifications.
2. Police in Uttar Pradesh, India, using Polygon's network to record public complaints, enhancing transparency and mitigating corruption.
3. The Swiss city of Lugano launching its local stablecoin, LVGA, powered by Polygon, for fast and secure transactions.
4. JPMorgan executing its first cross-border cryptocurrency transaction on Polygon's network, signaling increased interest in the network's capabilities.

These implementations demonstrate Polygon's potential to promote transparency, equality, and innovation on a global scale. As more use-cases emerge, Polygon's growing impact is likely to continue to expand across various industries.

title: Solana-Based NFT Marketplace Exchange.art to Expand Into Ethereum - Yahoo News Canada
summary:
Sure, here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Exchange.art, a popular Solana-based NFT marketplace, is expanding into Ethereum to provide support for over 80 Ethereum-based artists. The integration will go live on August 1 and aims to onboard new creators and collectors. Exchange.art's vision is to be a hub for digital art and eventually expand to traditional art, and being multichain is a step in that direction. Many artists struggle to sell their work across different ecosystems and marketplaces, and Exchange.art helps them leverage the two largest NFT ecosystems in one place. The marketplace has onboarded 16,000 Solana-based artists and introduced a royalties protection standard to help creators earn a consistent percentage across marketplaces.

title: Mara Launches Testnet as it Transitions into Mara Chain, an Ethereum Layer 2 Blockchain - bitcoinke.io
summary: Mara, an Africa-focused crypto startup, has launched a testnet for its Ethereum layer 2 chain, Mara Chain. The testnet allows developers to test and debug their applications before the official launch. Mara Chain is designed to be fast, economical, and compatible with other networks, and it utilizes MARA tokens for transaction fees. The launch comes after the introduction of the Mara Wallet, which allows users to trade and withdraw fiat currencies and the Mara token. Mara has also laid off 85% of its workforce and is seeking feedback from the developer community to improve the ecosystem.

title: 5 Cryptos to Follow Ripple's Victory: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB) DigiToads (TOADS), Cardano ... - Analytics Insight
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in 256 tokens or less:

Ripple's victory in its legal case against the SEC has renewed energy in the crypto market, leading to a rally in various coins. Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Coin, and Cardano have seen price increases, while DigiToads stands out as the best DeFi crypto with a unique gaming concept and potential for growth. The presale for DigiToads has reached new heights, with over $6.2 million raised. The community is growing rapidly, driven by gaming enthusiasts, crypto investors, and individuals seeking unique opportunities for wealth generation.

title: Revenue analysis of L1 blockchains: Ethereum and Tron dominate volumes thanks to crypto Pepe - The Cryptonomist
summary: In Q2 2023, Ethereum and Tron saw a surge in revenue due to the memecoin craze sparked by the PEPE crypto. Ethereum validators recorded a 83% increase in net fees, reaching $32 million on May 5, the peak of the hype. The two blockchain networks accounted for 93% of all L1 industry revenue. DeFi platforms on Ethereum and Tron generated $5.6 million in revenue over the weekend of May 6-7, with MEV-boost payments contributing significantly. The Pepe crypto burned around $1.1 million in ETH. The overall DeFi sector has generated $957 million in revenue, with a goal to reach $1 billion by the end of the year. Popular DeFi protocols include Lido, Uniswap, and MakerDAO, with Uniswap and Lido representing the industry benchmarks.

title: Elon Musk Rebranding of Twitter to X Sparks Crypto Payment Speculation for Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Ethereum (ETH), and Bitcoin (BTC) - Crypto News Flash
summary: Elon Musk's rebranding of Twitter to X has sparked speculation about the potential integration of cryptocurrencies as payment methods on the new platform. Musk's close ties to the cryptocurrency industry suggest that crypto payments may play a significant role in X's future. Potential payment tokens include Bitcoin, Dogecoin, Ripple's XRP, and Stellar (XLM). Dogecoin is a likely candidate due to Musk's association with the token and its fast transaction time and low fees. Bitcoin's popularity and scalability also make it a preferred choice. Ripple's XRP and Stellar's fast transaction times and low fees may also make them viable options. However, it is important to note that the information presented is for informational purposes only and should not be considered investment advice.
